attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many tines have we heard that an illegal immigrant went on a murdering rampage, served half his/her sentance and then 'has the right' to stay in Britain? Icing on the Cake: Gets a new identity, house, car and benefits. It's ridiculous. My petition is this: Serve your life sentance then deportation. No Questions asked. A murderer has lost his/her human right to stay in Britain when he/she decided to breach the Human rights of another

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
